settings.name: ClamiSaleList
settings.from: [dbo].[F_C_Claim] A inner join [F_ClaimPartList] B on A.F_ClaimCode=B.F_ClaimCode inner join [B_AutoArchives] C on A.B_ChassisCode=C.VIN left join B_Customer D on D.VIN=C.VIN

settings.name: ReturnOldPartsList
settings.select: A.F_PKId as ID ,A.SPDCode AS F_ClaimCode,B.F_ClaimTime,A.CarType as ModelName,A.VIN,A.UName as CustomerName ,A.UTel as MobileTel,A.P_PartCode as P_PartCodeOld ,A.P_PartName as P_PartNameOld,A.F_Total as F_ClaimPrice,A.F_Number, case when A.F_Status =2 then '待收货' when A.F_Status =5 then '无配件' else '已收货' end as F_StatusName, dbo.f_Getcodename('检验状态',A.F_ClaimOrNot) F_ClaimOrNotName,F_ClaimRemarks
settings.from: F_C_OldPartsReturnList A inner join F_C_Claim B ON A.SPDCode=B.F_ClaimCode

settings.name: ReturnOldPartsGridList
settings.select: A.F_PKId as ID,dbo.f_Getcodename('审核状态',A.F_Status) AS Old_F_Status ,A.F_OldPartsCode as Old_F_OldPartsCode,dbo.f_Getcodename('旧件返厂类型',A.F_DocType) as Old_F_DocType, A.F_OldReturnTime as Old_F_OldReturnTime,A.F_InputTime as UpdateDate,F_CarryName as Old_F_CarryName ,F_DeliveryNumber as Old_F_DeliveryNumber,F_Money as Old_F_Money, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM F_C_OldPartsReturnList WHERE F_Mid=A.F_PKId) AS SunOldPartsNubrm, (SELECT SUM(F_ClaimPrice) FROM F_C_OldPartsReturnList WHERE F_Mid=A.F_PKId) AS SunClaimPrice
